2022-09-04T15:11:00Z: And that's all from us! We'll be back next weekend for the final part of this triple header, with F1 heading to Monza. Catch you then, and thanks for following along as always!
2022-09-04T15:09:40Z: Here's the report from the Dutch Grand Prix.
2022-09-04T15:09:02Z: In the battle for second in the F1 points standings, Leclerc and Perez are tied on 201 points, with Russell getting within touching distance on 188, Sainz on 175 and Hamilton on 158.
2022-09-04T14:54:43Z: Russell was just 0.019s off taking the fastest lap bonus point off Verstappen with his final lap of the race, but just fell short.
2022-09-04T14:50:28Z: Fun fact: this is George Russell's first 2022 race finish that didn't end in third, fourth or fifth position.
2022-09-04T14:47:15Z: Nice to see so many happy Blackpool fans in the stands, delighted at going 1-0 up at Huddersfield...
2022-09-04T14:46:11Z: Verstappen is 109 points clear in the F1 title race now. He can't win the title at Monza but, at this rate, could in Singapore...
2022-09-04T14:41:23Z: Sainz's penalty moves Perez up to fifth, with Alonso sixth, Norris seventh, Sainz classified eighth, with Ocon and Stroll finishing the top 10.
2022-09-04T14:40:43Z: George Russell finishes second, and his bid for fastest lap right at the end just falls short by 0.02s! Charles Leclerc completes the podium, with Hamilton fourth.
2022-09-04T14:40:01Z: And Max Verstappen indeed wins the Dutch Grand Prix, to the delight of the home fans in attendance!
2022-09-04T14:39:05Z: Verstappen kicks off the final lap, and a few kilometres off chalking up a second Dutch GP win.
2022-09-04T14:36:58Z: With everyone else on the softs it is a bit of a stalemate behind the frontrunners. Norris continues to fight Alonso for seventh but can't find a way through.
2022-09-04T14:36:51Z: Three to go - and Verstappen is 3.9s clear of Russell now. Leclerc is another 4.4s behind.
2022-09-04T14:34:49Z: But it's a five-second penalty for Sainz, copping a penalty for an unsafe release under the safety car!
2022-09-04T14:34:18Z: Verstappen is 3.3s clear of Russell now, with five to go - Hamilton's case for fourth is being helped by Sainz and Perez battling over fifth.
2022-09-04T14:34:04Z: Norris is badgering Alonso for seventh, but the problem he's got is his best place to overtake at Turn 1 is exactly where the Alpine is strongest. He might need to get inventive to find a way through.
2022-09-04T14:32:35Z: Leclerc now dives past Hamilton for third place at the start of lap 66, as the Mercedes driver is struggling on those mediums.
2022-09-04T14:30:36Z: Russell, on the softs, now gets the draft on Hamilton and moves into second. Can he close Verstappen down? Hamilton's making his displeasure known on the radio, as he doesn't rate the call to pit Russell.
2022-09-04T14:28:23Z: It's a 1m13.652s for Verstappen now, opening a 2.1s lead over those two laps after the restart. Game over for everyone else.
2022-09-04T14:28:05Z: The midfield runners are well behaved further back at the race restart, with DRS is enabled at the start of lap 63.
2022-09-04T14:26:20Z: Sainz takes advantage of the other medium-shod runner Perez, as he gets by the Red Bull at the restart to take fifth.
2022-09-04T14:25:55Z: Hamilton pulls the pin, but Verstappen goes with him! Easy for Verstappen on those tyres, and takes the lead.
2022-09-04T14:25:00Z: Sainz remains sixth ahead of Alonso, Norris and Ocon after his near-misses and clips with that trio. So far there is no stewards investigation coming his way, but it was all a bit messy so watch this space.
2022-09-04T14:23:24Z: Safety car in at the end of lap 60.
2022-09-04T14:22:37Z: The lapped cars have been allowed to overtake the safety car, which will shuffle the pack back into order.
2022-09-04T14:21:46Z: Lapped cars may now overtake. Verstappen fresh tyres, Hamilton not. Flashbacks anyone?
2022-09-04T14:20:41Z: Russell grabs a very cheap soft-tyre stop, conceding second to Verstappen, as the safety car comes through the pits.
2022-09-04T14:19:14Z: Leclerc and Perez pitted after Verstappen, retaining fourth and fifth.
2022-09-04T14:18:46Z: All that chaos has seen Ocon pit which means Sainz cannot give the place back to the French driver.
2022-09-04T14:17:28Z: And Verstappen pits again! The Red Bull driver puts on the soft tyres - Mercedes do not respond, and Hamilton and Russell are first and second.
2022-09-04T14:17:05Z: Bottas has parked his Alfa Romeo right on the inside of the entry to Turn 1 and because he's effectively stranded that has meant the need for the full safety car.
2022-09-04T14:14:42Z: Bottas has come to a halt at the entry to Turn 1. The yellow flags are out just as Sainz is making a move on Ocon for sixth place!
2022-09-04T14:13:32Z: Hamilton does a 1m13.961s, which Russell follows with a 1m13.947s. Verstappen's within 12s now of Hamilton.
2022-09-04T14:13:11Z: Norris shows Alonso the outside of the track at Turn 1 to defend his place in eighth. The Alpine driver gives a quick wave of his right hand in protest.
2022-09-04T14:12:05Z: Vettel has been given a five-second penalty for ignoring blue flags after getting in the way of Hamilton vs Perez earlier. He's down in 16th so doesn't really have much to play for.
2022-09-04T14:11:09Z: Verstappen does, however, go 0.2s quicker than Hamilton by the end of lap 51, but the Mercedes driver returns the favour on the following lap.
2022-09-04T14:10:51Z: Tsunoda's stop-start, in, out, shake it all about moment will be investigated after the race. Good idea.
2022-09-04T14:09:42Z: Ocon was one of a few drivers not to pit under the Virtual Safety Car which has pushed him up to sixth place ahead of Sainz, Norris and Alonso. But he'll have old hards to defend with against that trio.
2022-09-04T14:08:41Z: It'll be interesting to see if this tyre difference between Verstappen and the Mercs will make the difference over the final 22 laps. Hamilton is 12.6s behind Verstappen at the end of lap 50.
2022-09-04T14:07:25Z: The Virtual Safety Car period ends and the race is back to green!
2022-09-04T14:06:02Z: Something really odd went on with Tsunoda's quick pair of pitstops and car there. Regardless of what it was, he's out of the car and out of the race.
2022-09-04T14:05:51Z: Norris takes the chance to stop, bolting on the softs. Verstappen will also come in - as do the Mercedes duo! Hards for Verstappen, mediums for both Mercedes-es!
2022-09-04T14:04:04Z: Once again Tsunoda stops at the side of the track, with the Virtual Safety Car deployed.
2022-09-04T14:03:22Z: This gets stranger and stranger, as Tsunoda pits, takes on softs, and then his AlphaTauri team appear to refasten his seatbelts. He gets going again but is still going slowly.
2022-09-04T14:03:05Z: Verstappen is, at the start of lap 47, 14.4s ahead of Hamilton.
2022-09-04T14:02:10Z: Replays of Tsunoda's pitstop don't show anything too unusual or signs of concern from the AlphaTauri mechanics, but whatever it was the Japanese driver has pitted again.
2022-09-04T14:01:52Z: Leclerc now pits, collecting the hard compound and rejoins in fourth - behind Russell.
2022-09-04T14:00:17Z: Sainz comes in for a stop, and Perez simultaneously clears Norris for what becomes fifth.
2022-09-04T13:59:05Z: At the end of lap 43, Tsunoda and Albon pit together and come out in 12th and 13th respectively.
2022-09-04T13:58:40Z: There's the evidence for Verstappen - Perez drops a 1m14.930s as he tries to clear Norris in sixth.
2022-09-04T13:56:42Z: Vettel has been put under investigation for ignoring blue flags. That'll be for his role as a moving chicane during the Hamilton vs Perez battle.
2022-09-04T13:55:52Z: Perez, having taken the best out of his tyres, comes in for stop number two and grabs the hard compound - perhaps as a bellwether for Verstappen. He rejoins in seventh.
2022-09-04T13:53:45Z: Zhou makes his second pitstop and serves his five-second penalty for speeding in the pitlane during his first trip to the service area. That puts him down to 15th behind Bottas.
2022-09-04T13:53:08Z: Russell used the Hamilton-Perez tangle to get right on the Red Bull's tail, tracks him through the banked Turn 14 and has a far easier ride past into fourth place.
2022-09-04T13:51:47Z: Hamilton sweeps around the outside of Perez into Turn 1, but Vettel comes out of the pits and boxes Hamilton in into Turn 3 - with Perez getting half a chance to trickle back through. But Hamilton's free and can now get at Leclerc.
2022-09-04T13:50:27Z: Bottas, Magnussen and Vettel take their second pitstops so it is a shake around in the midfield runners.
2022-09-04T13:48:16Z: Schumacher is the next to pit and it is another slow stop, 4.9s, and he comes out in 18th place behind Gasly.
2022-09-04T13:47:48Z: Hamilton hits back with a 1m15.472s, 0.005s quicker than Russell's statement. Not bad.
2022-09-04T13:47:08Z: Russell states his intent with a 1m15.477s, the fastest lap of the race, as he attempts to close up to Hamilton and give the cars ahead a headache later.
2022-09-04T13:46:22Z: Gasly dips out of the fight with Zhou for now as he makes his second pitstop, taking on fresh hards, and comes out in 18th.
2022-09-04T13:45:27Z: Russell gets his skates on to leave the pits ahead of the lapped Latifi. The Mercs are fourth and fifth and don't need to stop again. Hamilton's got good speed on those hards, so Mercedes could be in this...
2022-09-04T13:43:46Z: As we say that, Russell indeed pits at the end of lap 31 for the hards. Verstappen asks his team to monitor the hard runners, but doesn't necessarily fancy them himself.
2022-09-04T13:43:44Z: Zhou is stalking Gasly for 12th place and looks for a way up the inside at Turn 1 but backs out of it due to a late defensive move by the French driver.
2022-09-04T13:42:53Z: Hamilton comes back out in fifth place, and Russell will surely make his own stop to ditch mediums for hards soonish.
2022-09-04T13:41:39Z: Hamilton pits from the lead at the end of lap 29, and collects the hard tyre. Can he get to the end with them?
2022-09-04T13:40:18Z: A lap later Ricciardo does the same as Latifi and pits for fresh hards and comes out ahead of the Canadian.
2022-09-04T13:39:20Z: While neither Mercedes driver has pitted yet, Latifi makes his second stop of the race to go on to the hards. He's now last and some 13s off Magnussen ahead of him.
2022-09-04T13:38:47Z: Verstappen's doing a bit more than eking up now, as of lap 27, and he's scythed nearly a second out of the Mercedes driver. DRS on, round the outside at Turn 1, Verstappen P2. Easy.
2022-09-04T13:37:44Z: The biggest winner in the first round of pitstops was definitely Alonso, as he's popped up to ninth place ahead of Alpine team-mate Ocon. Both are on the hards aiming to get the finish on those tyres.
2022-09-04T13:37:20Z: And Verstappen is, indeed, eking up on Russell, with the gap at about a second. Good E-cupping.
2022-09-04T13:34:13Z: Vettel has not got on with these mediums since his early pitstop and he's already down in 17th place.
2022-09-04T13:33:41Z: Back on the track, Bottas had Vettel clashed wheels at Turn 1 fighting for position. The incident was noted by the stewards but there will be no investigation on it.
2022-09-04T13:31:40Z: The FIA stewards have a bit of work to do after this race - they've decided they will investigat the pitlane incident involving Perez and Sainz after the race.
2022-09-04T13:30:17Z: Verstappen now grabs a 1m15.904s with his fresh boots. He's over 5s clear of Leclerc.
2022-09-04T13:29:51Z: Zhou has duly been given a five-second penalty for speeding in the pitlane. The Alfa Romeo driver is currently in 14th place.
2022-09-04T13:28:42Z: Sainz continues his charge from that slow pitstop by taking sixth place from Albon with the aid of DRS at Turn 1.
2022-09-04T13:28:32Z: Perez is the quickest man on track at the moment, doing a 1m16.138s on his fresh mediums. He's looking to get ahead of the Mercedes duo when they eventually stop.
2022-09-04T13:27:19Z: McLaren rather show Ferrari how to do it with a speedy 2.4s pitstop for Norris. The Brit comes out directly behind Sainz and is on the hards, so it looks like he's one-stopping.
2022-09-04T13:27:20Z: Verstappen pits from the lead, grabs the medium compound and heads out. Hamilton takes the lead for the time being.
2022-09-04T13:26:08Z: Sainz is up to eighth after a couple of drivers pit ahead of him but he's currently 42.2s off the leaders - who are yet to pit - but he's a long way back.
2022-09-04T13:26:06Z: Leclerc comes in to stop from second. All four tyres are in position before the Monegasque comes in, so it's a lot quicker. Mediums for Leclerc.
2022-09-04T13:25:04Z: That latest error from the Ferrari Catalogue of Cock-ups lifts Hamilton into third, and Russell into fourth for the time being.
2022-09-04T13:24:20Z: Zhou's been noted for potentially speeding in the pitlane. That'll be a clearcut thing, so it looks like he'll be in trouble.
2022-09-04T13:22:41Z: Sainz comes in to pit from third place, grabbing a set of mediums - but it's a slow stop! Sainz loses well over 10s there and drops to 11th. Perez also pitted at the same time and comes out ahead.
2022-09-04T13:21:49Z: Schumacher endured a painfully long pitstop, 10s stationary, and comes out in 17th behind Zhou. That's potentially wrecked his race and fight for points.
2022-09-04T13:20:47Z: Zhou also pits, to come out in 18th behind Gasly but ahead of Vettel.
2022-09-04T13:20:13Z: Further ahead Alonso charges by the other AlphaTauri of Tsunoda at Turn 1 to take 11th place, but then pits at the end of the lap to cycle back through the pack.
2022-09-04T13:18:52Z: Gasly and Ricciardo respond to Vettel's early stop by pitting a lap later. But it is too late for Ricciardo, as Vettel has pulled off the undercut on him.
2022-09-04T13:17:56Z: Vettel is the early pitter, taking his first stop at the end of lap 11. He has gone from the softs to the mediums.
2022-09-04T13:15:56Z: But just like that, Alonso proves us wrong as he uses DRS to fly by Gasly into Turn 1 to take 12th place.
2022-09-04T13:15:10Z: Due to the tight, twisty and narrow nature of the circuit, there isn't too much early movers while everyone also has tyre wear protection to think about at this point in the race.
2022-09-04T13:13:08Z: Leclerc does a 1m16.213s on lap 6, just to try and get back into the one-second bracket behind Verstappen. But Verstappen responds to try and forge a strong lead.
2022-09-04T13:12:28Z: After his early salvo into the top six, Norris is keeping clear of Stroll in the battle for seventh. The McLaren driver's mediums are starting to come into the ideal window compared to Stroll's softs.
2022-09-04T13:11:03Z: Hamilton's got DRS on Sainz and he's hovering in his wake as he finds pace on the medium tyres.
2022-09-04T13:09:37Z: Ocon made the best start of the midfield runners to climb from 12th to ninth on the opening laps and is tucked up behind Stroll.
2022-09-04T13:09:02Z: Verstappen has broken clear of the DRS buffer, so the onus is on Leclerc to catch up.
2022-09-04T13:06:37Z: It's as you were at the end of lap 2 in the top six, after Norris cleared Russell for sixth. But Russell is keeping close.
2022-09-04T13:05:53Z: Magnussen hits the wall! The Haas driver goes wide at Turn 2 on the second lap and bounces over the gravel and into the outside wall. He continues on his way but is down in last place.
2022-09-04T13:04:28Z: A clean start by all runners, as Norris gets ahead of Russell into Turn 2 to take sixth place!
2022-09-04T13:04:15Z: Verstappen cuts across to cover the lead, as Leclerc follows - and Sainz evades an assault from Hamilton into the opening corner!
2022-09-04T13:03:31Z: And the Dutch Grand Prix begins! Let's go!
2022-09-04T13:01:01Z: The overcastness and the ferris wheel in the background puts one more in mind of Suzuka rather than Zandvoort. Maybe we just miss Suzuka.
2022-09-04T13:00:35Z: The formation lap is away. Let's get to it.
2022-09-04T12:58:08Z: Tyre news: softs for all except Hamilton, Russell, Norris, Schumacher, Albon and Magnussen - who are on mediums.
2022-09-04T12:55:43Z: We have coffee and five minutes before the race. We're ready to rock - are you?
2022-09-04T12:52:00Z: It's quite overcast at Zandvoort - 20% chance of rain. Not a huge possibility, but never rule it out.
2022-09-04T12:51:35Z: Will avoid spoilers, but the MotoGP race at Misano featured a very thrilling battle for victory. If F1 gets anything like that today, it'll be fun.
2022-09-04T12:36:07Z: 25 minutes to go, and the cars are sat on the grid - and the drivers do their final bit of preparation before settling in for a Sunday afternoon drive.
2022-09-04T12:21:38Z: Sergio Perez and Lance Stroll have both had changes to their power units between qualifying and the race - but as they're components already in the pool, they won't get penalties. Stroll had been denied a chance to run in Q3 with his issues.
2022-09-04T12:20:00Z: So let's recap yesterday as we look forward to today's race: Max Verstappen grabbed pole having looked imperious in qualifying. Leclerc was fractions away from upsetting the home fans, and starts alongside.
2022-09-04T12:10:08Z: In just over 50 minutes, we'll have lights out at Zandvoort - and the 72-lap blast around the circuit on the Dutch seafront will begin. Let's hope for a fun one.
2022-09-04T12:06:19Z: Good afternoon everyone, and welcome to our Autosport Live coverage of race day for the Dutch Grand Prix!
